name: Cloud Fighter (cardvark61)
description:
This a very short game for the Mini Jam. WASD or arrow keys to move, LMB to aim and shoot. In the boss level, you can double jump. 

Tips:

-Sustained fire makes your weapon inaccurate. Take breaks to let it cool down.

-Your bullets can damage and dissipate the clouds that you stand on, so be careful.

-Enemies will come from the red portals. You can use this to plan for when they come.

-Blue dust will lead you to where you have to go.

-Flashing yellow/orange orbs will explode after a time, or when you shoot them.
